nodes.documentation:
* @dev Stores permissions and validators and provides setter and getter methods. 
Permissions determine which methods users have access to call. Validators
are able to mutate permissions at the Regulator level.
nodes.name: RegulatorStorage

nodes.documentation: Events
nodes.name: PermissionAdded

nodes.documentation: @notice Throws if called by any account that does not have access to set attributes
nodes.name: onlyValidator
addPermission

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes a permission the list of permissions.
@param _methodsignature Signature of the method that this permission controls.
nodes.name: removePermission

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Permission being set must be for a valid method signature"

arguments.value: Permission being set must be for a valid method signature

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Permission being set must be for a valid method signature"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets a permission in the list of permissions that a user has.
@param _methodsignature Signature of the method that this permission controls.
nodes.name: setUserPermission

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Permission being removed must be for a valid method signature"

arguments.value: Permission being removed must be for a valid method signature

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Permission being removed must be for a valid method signature"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes a permission from the list of permissions that a user has.
@param _methodsignature Signature of the method that this permission controls.
